casebody.data:
Hubert F. LAUGHARN, as Trustee in Bankruptcy of Hercules Gasoline Company, a Corporation, Bankrupt, Appellant, v. STATE OF CALIFORNIA, Appellee. No. 7613. Circuit Court of Appeals, Ninth Circuit June 5, 1935. Leo V. Youngworth, J. Harold Decker, and Raphael Dechter, all of Los Angeles, Cal., for appellant. U. S. Webb, Atty. Gen., and John O. Palstine, Deputy Atty. Gen., for the State of California.

Before WILBUR and MATHEWS, Circuit Judges, and ST. SURE, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Upon consideration of the record and briefs filed in this court and after oral argument of counsel, ordered decree of, District Court affirmed upon the authority of this court’s decision in Pauley v. State of California, 75 F.(2d) 120.
